org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.util

Class MathProgrammingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.util.MathProgrammingUtil

  • public class MathProgrammingUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for LP/MIP solvers
    Version:
    13-4-2015
    Author:
    Joris Kinable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MathProgrammingUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean doubleToBoolean(double value)
      Returns true if the variable is +/- 1, false if the variable is +/- 0, and throws an error if the value is more than PRECISION away from either 0 or 1, where PRECISION is specified in Configuration.
      static int doubleToInt(double value)
      Returns the nearest rounded int.
      static double doubleToRoundedDouble(double value)
      Returns the nearest rounded double.
      static boolean isFractional(double value)
      Returns true if variable is fractional, i.e more than PRECISION away from the nearest int value, false otherwise, where PRECISION is specified in Configuration.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • MathProgrammingUtil

    • Method Detail

      • doubleToRoundedDouble

        public static double doubleToRoundedDouble(double value)
        Returns the nearest rounded double. Throws an exception if the nearest double is further away than a given constant, where the constant equals PRECISION as specified in Configuration.
        Parameters:
        value - value to be rounded
        Returns:
        rounded double

      • doubleToInt

        public static int doubleToInt(double value)
        Returns the nearest rounded int. Throws an exception if the nearest int is further away than a given constant, where the constant equals PRECISION as specified in Configuration.
        Parameters:
        value - value to be rounded
        Returns:
        integer represented by the double

      • doubleToBoolean

        public static boolean doubleToBoolean(double value)
        Returns true if the variable is +/- 1, false if the variable is +/- 0, and throws an error if the value is more than PRECISION away from either 0 or 1, where PRECISION is specified in Configuration.
        Parameters:
        value - value to be rounded
        Returns:
        boolean value represented by the double

      • isFractional

        public static boolean isFractional(double value)
        Returns true if variable is fractional, i.e more than PRECISION away from the nearest int value, false otherwise, where PRECISION is specified in Configuration.
        Parameters:
        value - to be checked
        Returns:
        true when the provided double is fractional
